msbt.message: I get très relaxing vibes from this place.When my hype gets WAY too hype? I walk around here to calm down
This spot has a kind of energy that's le perfect for practicing my dance moves!
I saw walking around here the other day humming to ! Strolls are always a totally fab time for a little tune!
I feel like good stuff happens whenever I walk around this area, so I come here on the reg. One time I saw a grasshopper just over there. He had a beard! And he winked at me! I fainted. On the spot.

I use the stuff I see on my walks for, you know, song-writing inspiration! Like this one♪ I saw a treeeeee It was taaaaall and greeeeen And his name was Roger ♪I'm still figuring out the lyrics. That's why I'm out here walking!

Hi there! I'm trying to turn my house into something a little moreME!<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />They say a house is kind of like your castle or something, right?OHMIGOSH! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Not to get, you know, off topic, butif I had a castle, that'd make me the princess.I'd be the first-ever princess pop star!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="10" />Have you ever been inside 's house before? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />'s a LEGIT interior decorator.Like the magazines say, you need to decorate like someone might see it.
This is a super nice place to set up, . A house will be great here!You sure do know your real estate, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />, your house is so tiny<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />AND ADORABLE!You have to share all your decorating tips, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />, your house is bigger than when you moved in, isn't it? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Très cool.That means you've got more room in there for all sorts of stuff!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />You have an extra room in the back of your house?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />What're you doing back there?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />, your house has three rooms in it, right? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I am SOOOOOOOOOO jealous! Three rooms is more than two, which is great. But it's also less than four, and I know four's no good for me.I've never understood it, but any time there's more than three doors in a room, I freak out!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your house is, like, super big now, right, ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Ohmigosh! Could you turn one of the rooms into a studio for me so I can record my first album? I'm just kidding! I can't record anything yet. I still need to get K.K. Slider to be my producerAnd return my phone calls.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I canNOT believe you have a two-story house, !
I am legit jealous you have a basement in your house, !Basements are great for screaming! Nobody will hear you!Singing! I meant singing.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /> is living in a tent, huh? You think they'll build a house eventually?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />What if they actually love living in a tent and they are just going to live in a tent forever?!Hang on! That could be pretty neat!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="10" />'s house is so tiny and cozy looking. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I kind of love it

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />'s house is bigger than I'd have guessed!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Sometimes I think I want a bigger house so I'll have room for more stuff. InsteadI just bury things. Gets it out of sight AND out of my house for WAY cheaper.
, did you hear? added a second room to their house.<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I wonder what they use it for?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />'s house is très grand! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's almost big enough to be a pop star's starter house!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />'s house is, like, totally huge, right?!I feel like you'd get lost in a place that big. You'd have to put up road signs. "This way to the kitchen!" <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Exceptwhat if you got lost putting up the signs?!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Isn't it awesome 's house has two stories?I'm, you know, a slob—so I could never keep a place that big clean Hang on! I wouldn't HAVE to clean<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />When one room got too messy, I'd move to a new room!<10_4 /> I'm a total genius!

Did you hear? <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />'s house has a basement!I wonder what they're secretly doing down there?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />What? I'm not weird. Folks do secret things in basements.<10_4 /> All the time! <10_4 />Just ask anybody!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Timmy's fab at business, and his store's the reason why <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />we can live on this rock with no probs!

<20_2 arg="10" />The stuff they sell in Nook's Cranny<20_2 arg="9" /> is pretty chic, trendy, fabtastico, and beaucoup le want too! It's like Timmy and Tommy are reading my thoughts and know everything I want to buy.<10_4 /> Hang on!Theythey can't actually read my thoughts, right, ?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Nook's Cranny has, I mean, EVERYTHING you'd need!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Sometimes I go in JUST to browse, then go homeand find a place to put all the stuff I bought!

Did you know that Blathers is telling everyone that will have a museum soon? <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="10" />I guess we could see dinosaurs there once he's done, maybe? That would be le bonkersaurus-rex! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I should go ask how to help him out! Because, come on. DINOSAURS!

Resident Services has a chic, yet functional, building. <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I bet I could do all sorts of official stuff in there.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I could get licenses for things, or I could pay fines for NOT having licenses for things

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Whenever I see an airplane, I think, "Someday I'm going to hop on a plane for my world tour!" <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />And, like, ALL my fans will greet me at the airport! Just thinking about it gets me SO excited!
Peeps love to spend time here since it's all wide open and empty.But don't you think this plaza would be a très amazing venue for a rock show?!<10_4 /> Starring me?!
I love coming to this plaza! Someone is almost always here, so I can chat whenever!I mean, this time YOU were here, ! I'm the luckiest on the island!
<20_3 arg="10" /><20_3 arg="9" />I so love the tailor display window!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" /> It's like, "Look at all this fabric you could hang on your fab self!"

Wooo! We've got a new resident on ! <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I'm so excited to see their new house!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />A person's house says a lot about them. My house says, "Fashion AND passion live here!"

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I try really hard to match the trendy vibe here at the museum. But do you know the best part of that vibe?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />You learn a bunch just by being here! , level up your brain. There might be a quiz later

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />You know how it's kind of dark at the fish exhibitlike you're underwater? Does thatdoes that freak you out? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I have enough nightmares about fish. I don't need to hang out with them at the museum
I'm kind of obsessed with looking at right now. You can see them at the bug exhibit at the museum, and the way they move is just SOmesmerizing
It's probs surprising, but I think fossils are kind of awesome. It's exciting to think about these ancient things and how they used to live right where we do now.

So, I like to do this thing where I imagine myself as a famous artist.Like, I imagine myself painting really beautiful pictures and sculpting clay into super-pretty pots or something. Sometimes I visit the museum just so I can walk around pretending to be a famous artist! See, the deal isimagining yourself to be a famous artist is THE best way to become a famous artist. It's called "visualization," and I hear ALL the best artists are doing it.Like, have you seen the ?After all that visualization, I could totes create that myself, .
